partnerDetails.about:
Afrimax is an IT Outsourcing and IT Consulting firm specializing in computers, telecommunication, security and networks. Our broad offering include sales of office equipment, office supplies, workflow solutions and a wide range of ICT Services covering a broad spectrum of solutions and systems integration.

We focus on making the difference and creating values by uncovering cost saving opportunities and hidden efficiencies by providing Total ICT Solutions, ridding on the phylosophy of excellent service provision and detailed attention to the needs of our customers.

descriptions.description:
Afrimax is an IT Outsourcing and IT Consulting firm specializing in computers, telecommunication, security and networks. Our broad offering include sales of office equipment, office supplies, workflow solutions and a wide range of ICT Services covering a broad spectrum of solutions and systems integration.

We focus on making the difference and creating values by uncovering cost saving opportunities and hidden efficiencies by providing Total ICT Solutions, ridding on the phylosophy of excellent service provision and detailed attention to the needs of our customers.
